column1: #text=I exited my home and locked my front door .
#text=I walked down my stoop stairs and turned left .
#text=The bus stop was three and a half blocks away .
#text=I had looked up the bus schedule and the bus was supposed to be arriving in ten minutes .
#text=I arrived at the bench with a few minutes to spare .
#text=I sat on the bench underneath the rain awning and read my book until I noticed the bus approaching .
#text=I stood up , closed my book , and fished through my purse for my metrocard .
#text=The bus pulled to a stop and the doors opened .
#text=I climbed up the steps and pushed my metrocard into the automated ticket taker .
#text=The machine beeped and I read the digital display showing me that I had some money left on my card .
#text=I was glad to have enough left over for my return trip .
#text=I put my metrocard away and walked toward the back of the bus .
#text=There was an empty seat near the window and I sat down .
#text=I gazed out the window , choosing not to continue reading my book because it makes me carsick .
#text=When the bus neared my destination , I pressed the button to request a stop .
#text=The bus stopped and I said excuse me to a few fellow passengers as I made my way to the back door .
#text=I touched the tape on the doors and they opened automatically .
#text=I gave a wave of thanks to the bus driver and stepped down carefully onto the curb .
